TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit Timer extends System.ComponentModel.Component

summary.span: 实现按用户定义的时间间隔引发事件的计时器。

span.span: Implements a timer that raises an event at user-defined intervals.

summary.span: 此计时器最宜用于 Windows 窗体应用程序中，并且必须在窗口中使用。

span.span: This timer is optimized for use in Windows Forms applications and must be used in a window.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 用于按用户定义的时间间隔引发事件。A is used to raise an event at user-defined intervals. 此 Windows 计时器适用于单线程环境，在此环境中，UI 线程用于执行处理。This Windows timer is designed for a single-threaded environment where UI threads are used to perform processing. 它要求用户代码提供 UI 消息泵，并且始终从同一线程操作，或将调用封送到其他线程。It requires that the user code have a UI message pump available and always operate from the same thread, or marshal the call onto another thread. 使用此计时器时，使用 事件执行轮询操作，或在指定的时间段内显示初始屏幕。When you use this timer, use the event to perform a polling operation or to display a splash screen for a specified period of time. 每当 属性设置为 `true` 且 属性大于零时，将根据 属性设置的时间间隔引发事件 。Whenever the property is set to `true` and the property is greater than zero, the event is raised at intervals based on the property setting. 此类提供一些方法来设置间隔，以及启动和停止计时器。This class provides methods to set the interval, and to start and stop the timer. > [!NOTE] > Windows 窗体计时器组件是单线程的，且限制为55毫秒的准确度。The Windows Forms Timer component is single-threaded, and is limited to an accuracy of 55 milliseconds. 如果需要具有更高准确性的多线程计时器，请使用 命名空间中的类 。If you require a multithreaded timer with greater accuracy, use the class in the namespace. ## Examples 下面的示例实现了一个简单的间隔计时器，每隔五秒就会发出警报。The following example implements a simple interval timer, which sets off an alarm every five seconds. 当出现警报时，会 显示警报启动的次数，并提示用户确定计时器是否应继续运行。When the alarm occurs, a displays a count of the number of times the alarm has started and prompts the user as to whether the timer should continue to run. [!code-cpp[Classic Timer Example 2#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/Classic Timer Example 2/CPP/source.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[Classic Timer Example 2#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/Classic Timer Example 2/CS/source.cs#1)] [!code-vb[Classic Timer Example 2#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/Classic Timer Example 2/VB/source.vb#1)]

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class.

summary.span: 初始化 类的新实例。

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 创建新计时器时，它将被禁用;也就是说，将 设置为 `false` 。When a new timer is created, it is disabled; that is, is set to `false`. 若要启用计时器，请调用 方法或将设置 为 `true` 。To enable the timer, call the method or set to `true`. 如果计时器处于禁用状态，并且计时器超出范围，则在发生垃圾回收时将释放计时器。If the timer is disabled and the timer is out of scope, the timer will be disposed when garbage collection occurs. 如果计时器已启用（即使它超出范围），则不会进行垃圾回收。If the timer is enabled, even if it is out of scope, it is not subject to garbage collection.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig specialname rtspecialname instance void .ctor(class System.ComponentModel.IContainer container) cil managed

span.span: An that represents the container for the timer.

summary.span: 将指定的容器与 类的新实例一起初始化。

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class together with the specified container.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 构造函数使你能够将 与任何 对象关联。The constructor enables you to associate a with any object. 通过将与 类似的关联，你可以将的生存期的控制移交 给 。By associating the like this, you hand over control of the lifetime of the to the . 如果你在应用程序中使用多个组件，并且想要同时处理它们，这会很有用。This can be useful if you use a number of components in your application and want to dispose of all of them simultaneously. 例如，如果将 、和与相关联 ，则 对的调用 将强制处理所有这些组件。For example, if you associate a , an , and a with a , calling on the will force disposal of all of these components as well. 创建新计时器时，它将被禁用;也就是说，将 设置为 `false` 。When a new timer is created, it is disabled; that is, is set to `false`. 若要启用计时器，请调用 方法或将设置 为 `true` 。To enable the timer, call the method or set to `true`. 此实例将一直存在，直到其容器将其发布到垃圾回收。This instance will exist until its container releases it to garbage collection.

param.name: disposing
param.span: 表示释放托管资源和非托管资源。

span.span: to release both managed and unmanaged resources.

param.span: 设置为 将只释放非托管资源。

span.span: to release only the unmanaged resources.

summary.span: 释放由计时器使用的资源（内存除外）。

span.span: Disposes of the resources, other than memory, used by the timer.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用完计时器时调用。Call when you are finished using the timer. 方法使计时器处于不可用状态。The method leaves the timer in an unusable state. 调用之后 ，必须释放对该计时器的所有引用，以便垃圾回收来回收其占用的内存。After you call , you must release all references to the timer so the memory it was occupying can be reclaimed by garbage collection. > [!NOTE] > 在释放对计时器的最后一个引用之前，始终调用。Always call before you release your last reference to the timer. 否则，在垃圾回收调用 timer 对象的析构函数之前，将不会释放计时器使用的资源。Otherwise, the resources the timer is using will not be freed until garbage collection calls the destructor of the timer object.

span.span: if the timer is currently enabled; otherwise, .
The default is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 值为时，计时器不会进行垃圾回收 `true` 。The timer is not subject to garbage collection when the value is `true`. 调用 方法与将设置 为相同 `true` 。Calling the method is the same as setting to `true`. 同样，调用 方法与将设置 为相同 `false` 。Likewise, calling the method is the same as setting to `false`. ## Examples 下面的示例实现了一个简单的间隔计时器，每隔五秒就会发出警报。The following example implements a simple interval timer, which sets off an alarm every five seconds. 当出现警报时，会 显示警报启动的次数，并提示用户计时器是否应继续运行。When the alarm occurs, a displays a count of the number of times the alarm has started and prompts the user whether the timer should continue to run. [!code-cpp[Classic Timer Example 2#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/Classic Timer Example 2/CPP/source.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[Classic Timer Example 2#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/Classic Timer Example 2/CS/source.cs#1)] [!code-vb[Classic Timer Example 2#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/Classic Timer Example 2/VB/source.vb#1)]

summary.span: 获取或设置在相对于上一次发生的 事件引发 事件之前的时间（以毫秒为单位）。

span.span: Gets or sets the time, in milliseconds, before the event is raised relative to the last occurrence of the event.

value.span: 指定在相对于上一次发生的 事件引发 事件之前的毫秒数。

span.span: An specifying the number of milliseconds before the event is raised relative to the last occurrence of the event.
The value cannot be less than one.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 若要获取间隔中的秒数，请将此数字除以1000。To get the number of seconds in the interval, divide this number by 1,000. ## Examples 下面的代码示例实现了一个简单的间隔计时器，每隔五秒就会发出警报。The following code example implements a simple interval timer, which sets off an alarm every five seconds. 当出现警报时，会 显示警报启动的次数，并提示用户计时器是否应继续运行。When the alarm occurs, a displays a count of the number of times the alarm has started and prompts the user whether the timer should continue to run. [!code-cpp[Classic Timer Example 2#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/Classic Timer Example 2/CPP/source.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[Classic Timer Example 2#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/Classic Timer Example 2/CS/source.cs#1)] [!code-vb[Classic Timer Example 2#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/Classic Timer Example 2/VB/source.vb#1)]

span.span: An that contains the event data.
This is always .
Raises the event.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 为每个计时器计时周期调用此方法。This method is called for each timer tick. 它调用通过添加的任何方法 。It calls any methods that are added through . 如果要从继承 ，可以重写此方法。If you are inheriting from , you can override this method. 引发事件时，将通过委托调用事件处理程序。Raising an event invokes the event handler through a delegate. 有关详细信息，请参阅 [处理和引发事件](/dotnet/standard/events/)。For more information, see [Handling and Raising Events](/dotnet/standard/events/).

para.span: 当 在派生类中重写时，请确保调用基类的 方法。

span.span: When overriding in a derived class, make sure that you call the base class's method.

span.span: Starts the timer.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 还可以通过将 属性设置为来启动计时器 `true` 。You can also start the timer by setting the property to `true`. ## Examples 下面的代码示例实现了一个简单的间隔计时器，每隔五秒就会发出警报。The following code example implements a simple interval timer, which sets off an alarm every five seconds. 当出现警报时，会 显示警报启动的次数，并提示用户计时器是否应继续运行。When the alarm occurs, a displays a count of the number of times the alarm has started and prompts the user whether the timer should continue to run. [!code-cpp[Classic Timer Example 2#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/Classic Timer Example 2/CPP/source.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[Classic Timer Example 2#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/Classic Timer Example 2/CS/source.cs#1)] [!code-vb[Classic Timer Example 2#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/Classic Timer Example 2/VB/source.vb#1)]

[<System.Runtime.TargetedPatchingOptOut("Performance critical to inline this type of method across NGen image boundaries")>]

span.span: Stops the timer.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 还可以通过将 属性设置为来停止计时器 `false` 。You can also stop the timer by setting the property to `false`. 一个 对象可以在同一应用程序会话内启用和禁用多次。A object may be enabled and disabled multiple times within the same application session. 在 通过调用禁用后，调用 将导致 重新启动中断的间隔。Calling after you have disabled a by calling will cause the to restart the interrupted interval. 如果将 设置为5000毫秒的间隔，并 在3000毫秒内调用，则调用 将导致在 引发事件前等待5000毫秒 。If your is set for a 5000-millisecond interval, and you call at around 3000 milliseconds, calling will cause the to wait 5000 milliseconds before raising the event. > [!NOTE] > 对 Windows 窗体应用程序内的任何调用停止会 导致 立即处理来自应用程序中其他组件的消息，因为所有 组件都在主应用程序线程上运行。Calling Stop on any within a Windows Forms application can cause messages from other components in the application to be processed immediately, because all components operate on the main application thread. 如果有两个 组件，一个设置为700毫秒，一组设置为500毫秒，而在 第一个组件上调用 ，则应用程序可能首先收到第二个组件的事件回调。If you have two components, one set to 700 milliseconds and one set to 500 milliseconds, and you call on the first , your application may receive an event callback for the second component first. 如果这证明有问题，请考虑 改用命名空间中的类。If this proves problematic, consider using the class in the namespace instead. ## Examples 下面的代码示例实现了一个简单的间隔计时器，每隔五秒就会发出警报。The following code example implements a simple interval timer, which sets off an alarm every five seconds. 当出现警报时，会 显示警报启动的次数，并提示用户计时器是否应继续运行。When the alarm occurs, a displays a count of the number of times the alarm has started and prompts the user whether the timer should continue to run. [!code-cpp[Classic Timer Example 2#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/Classic Timer Example 2/CPP/source.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[Classic Timer Example 2#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/Classic Timer Example 2/CS/source.cs#1)] [!code-vb[Classic Timer Example 2#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/Classic Timer Example 2/VB/source.vb#1)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 从事件中调用类的方法 可能不会按预期方式运行，因为显示断言对话框可能会导致 Windows 重复引发事件。Calling the method on the class from within the event may not behave as expected, as displaying the assertion dialog box may cause Windows to raise the event repeatedly. 建议你避免在此事件内测试断言，并 改用、、 或 方法。We recommend that you refrain from testing assertions within this event, and use the , , , or methods instead. 有关处理事件的详细信息，请参阅 [处理和引发事件](/dotnet/standard/events/)。For more information about handling events, see [Handling and Raising Events](/dotnet/standard/events/). ## Examples 下面的代码示例实现了一个简单的间隔计时器，每隔五秒就会发出警报。The following code example implements a simple interval timer, which sets off an alarm every five seconds. 当出现警报时，会 显示警报启动的次数，并提示用户计时器是否应继续运行。When the alarm occurs, a displays a count of the number of times the alarm has started and prompts the user whether the timer should continue to run. [!code-cpp[Classic Timer Example 2#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/Classic Timer Example 2/CPP/source.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[Classic Timer Example 2#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/Classic Timer Example 2/CS/source.cs#1)] [!code-vb[Classic Timer Example 2#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/Classic Timer Example 2/VB/source.vb#1)]
